text: Motion
Motion
Comedian
Motion

Ah, Nichika! Good morning!
Let's have a good day today too.

...
Good morning. Looking forward to working with youー...!

...By the way,
I'd be happy if you could stop calling me thatー!

Hahaha, you little rascal!
Nichika, Nichika, Nichikaー!

──Oh, right. Let's plan something today
after rehearsal, we'll have a little time, right?

...Hmm. Time's a bit tight, honestlyー
I'm super busy, you knowー!
Huh, what? Reallyー?

Yes, yesー
I don't want to be associated with idle comedians!

...Well then, excuse meー
Oh, please don't peek into the dressing room, okay?

......Huh?
Umm, sorry, can I make a comeback on that last comment?

...It's okay, but you know
I'm just a fellow performer, right?

I-I'm sorry...
...I apologize. I────

...I'm not like Nanakusa-san's big brother or anything, I'm just
part of the team making the show... So, let's cooperate on thatー
...Nichika?
Did you hear that just now?

No, I just... got here but────
Did something happen?

Nothing happened
...Absolutely nothing happened.
